alert.note: Alert for Dripping Springs; Globe, Miami; Pinal, Superstition Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 7:22PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Gila and Pinal Counties through 800 PM MST... At 722 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles north of Kearny, or 12 miles southeast of Superior, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Top-Of-The-World. This includes the following highways... US Highway 60 between mile markers 236 and 242. AZ Route 77 between mile markers 155 and 167. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Dripping Springs; Globe, Miami; Pinal, Superstition Mountains
